description:
The XTG TechnologyUltra-Slim"Solar Portable Battery and Charger"is the perfect solution for emergency power and power on the go.TheXTG-SOL1500includes:Built-in Lithium Ion battery that can be charged using the provided USB cable or using sunlight via the 
solar panel.USB output to charge your cell phone, smart phone, Mp3, Bluetooth headset and more on the go (using your device's existing USB 
cable).Fully adjustable built in powerful LED light, ideal for reading and more!A capacity indicator located on back to show charge status and remaining power levelMini USB Charge Cable2 Window Suction CupsThis is the perfect unit for campers, travelers, gadget enthusiasts, hikers, and power hungry consumers.NOTE: The unit will only charge up to 50-60% when using the solar chargingGreat for Emergency PowerUse USB charging to charge the internal battery fully.
title: Premium Solar Charger - Ultra Thin Solar Powered Backup Battery and Charger for Cell Phones, iPhone, iPod, and Most USB Powered Device - Also Includes Built-in LED Reading Light and Window / Windshield Suction Cups
